amendatorysection.catchline: Share of absent owner; how conserved.
amendatorysection.para: The ascertained share of any absent owner shall be retained, or the proceeds invested for his benefit.

annotation.para: Money paid to clerk of district court by referee in partition is received in official capacity and sureties are liable. Dirks v. Juel, 59 Neb. 353, 80 N.W. 1045 (1899).
